author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Kirby and the Forgotten Land receives a bespoke Switch 2 Edition, dramatically improving image quality while doubling frame-rate. There's also new content too, presumably beyond the technical capabilities of the last-gen hardware. So, what do you get for the upgrade fee? Tom has some answers for you.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe


00:00 Introduction/New Features
03:16 Switch 1 vs 2 Comparison
07:11 Switch 1 Frame-Rate Test Refresher
08:48 Switch 2 Frame-Rate Tests
10:13 Conclusion
title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land Switch 2 Edition - DF Review - Tech Upgrades + New Content Tested
